appetizers.name: Yum and Drummers
appetizers.description: We don't know how these are made. We sling them in the back and they just turn out. No one has died yet.

appetizers.name: True cheese fries
appetizers.description: these are literally just fried cheese

coldSandwiches.name: The Shimmy Shake
coldSandwiches.description: Not actually a Shake! Just a good group of foods hanging out.

coldSandwiches.name: The Round n' Roudy
coldSandwiches.description: A true American Hero, if Heros still existed in this modern day.

hotSandwiches.name: A Good Time
ingredients: Subway Brand Italian Herbs and Cheese Bread
a very Giving slice of Pastrami
hotSandwiches.description: This is the sandwhich that eyed you from across the room and made you say 'eh, I'll settle'.

desserts.name: Cake From The Lake
desserts.description: Legendary cake, found by the Legndary King Arthur. He pulled it out of a lake after he did the stuff wit that sword.

desserts.name: A Normal Ice Cream Cookie
desserts.description: We're not Playing. Look. It's just chocalate chip and vanilla and everything. $2.50

drinks.name: Soda Feelings
ingredients: a blend of 15 different secret recipes all at once
drinks.description: Eating your feelings is so 2015. Just drink them instead.

drinks.name: Blood of my enemies.
drinks.description: Not actually blood, but we got your enemies to each say something nice about you and whisper it into the drink before we bottled it.
